a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())

print(c - (a - b) if c - (a - b) > 0 else 0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if (c - (a - b)) > 0:
    print(c - (a - b))
else:
    print(0)


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) 
if b + c > a: 
    print(b + c - a) 
else: 
    print(0)
